issue.title: [Developer] Add support for Parquet in pull request check by GitHub Actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6942](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6942). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- title check should work with parquet and arrow Jira issues.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6942?focusedCommentId=16966294) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Split "see if it is possible to apply language tags automatically." to ARROW-7055.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6942?focusedCommentId=16966889) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
